ValidationRule.description: Users are not allowed to edit after Sell/Execute Contract approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Forward_Contract_Execute_Approved__c , !Spot_Rate_Contract_Approved__c , OR( ISCHANGED( Bank_Contract_No_Sell_Execute__c ) , ISCHANGED( Spot_Rate_Sell_Execute__c ) , ISCHANGED( Transaction_Date_Sell_Execute__c ) , ISCHANGED( Effective_Date_Sell_Execute__c ) ) ) && NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Automation_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit after Forward Contract Sell/Execute approved.
